entry.dcterms:title: Household Statistics Surveys 1980. Changes in the Hungarian consumption structure in active and inactive households.
entry.dcterms:creator: Dávid, Kriszta
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-A59e: Household Statistics Surveys 1980. Changes in the Hungarian consumption structure in active and inactive households.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Baranyai, István
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Central Statistical Office Department of Economics
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-02-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: the changes of consumer strategy in time and the variation over space by various social strata and groups in connection with income, size and composition of households, type of the place of residence, the dwelling, and the possession of durables
entry.dcterms:subject: family life, marriage, relationship
demography
consumption/consumer behavior
economic policy
income, property and savings
housing
religion and values
household
survey data
time-series
A sample of appr. 8.500 households covering households with active wage-earners (excluding self-employed persons) and inactive households (with no active wage-earners).
Consumption/expenditure diaries and data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers
A
